German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

From Bäcker (“baker”) +‎ -ei.

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): [bɛkəˈʁai]
  • Audio
    		(file)
  • Rhymes: -aɪ̯

Noun[edit]

Bäckerei f (genitive Bäckerei, plural Bäckereien)

  1. bakery, baker’s, bakehouse, bakeshop
  2. biscuits, small pastry

Declension[edit]

Declension of Bäckerei

Luxembourgish[edit]

Noun[edit]

Bäckerei f (plural Bäckereien)

  1. bakery
